name: Aero Tales Online: The World - Anime MMORPG
name_original: Aero Tales Online: The World - Anime MMORPG
description:
• Combat:
    You can play in action-combat mode or tab-target combat mode. Show your difference with many combo combinations and gameplay styles!

  • Customization:
    Special combat style and items for each class. Choose your side, customize your character and join the game with your unique character.

  • Events:
    Many events await you every day. Multiple sudden wars, ranked arena battles, raids and more!

  • Exploration:
    After a certain level you can fly through the whole Aero World and explore never seen places.

  • Alternatives:
    There are also many activities you can do apart from war and quests. Decorate your house, farm, impress people with your musical talent or marry your partner. There is no limit to what can be done in this world.

  • Play for free:
    Aero Tales Online is completely free to play.
